roleset.name: distribute money
roleset.note: DISBURSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'disburse' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 13.2. (from disburse.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: with recipient
example.text: Friday's auction will be limited to [$150 million]-1 disbursed *trace*-1 by the Central Bank to potential investors.

example.name: with source
example.text: And though federal law dictates that [only $100 million]-1 can be disbursed *trace*-1 from that fund in any one state per disaster, administration officials expect Congress to move in to authorize spending more now in California.
